item.description:
On Sunday, January 6 (weather permitting because safety
Comes first), we are Meeting Up for Coffee & a Movie.

We will meet at 12:30 at the Barnes and Noble in
North Haven.
We will meet in the Cafe section of the Book Store.
First one there should grab some coffee and a table.
The movie does start until 1:30,
So please come at 1:00 at the very latest to the Book Store.

North Haven Crossing
470 Universal Drive North
North Haven, CT 06473
203-234-1805

http://storelocator.b...

storelocator.barnesandnoble.com/storedetail.do;jsessionid=460F2AD2D4267C78C6FFC1FF3174EBA7?store=1897

**Due to limited seating in the North Haven Barnes and Nobel,
I will change the seating number to 10 for the Unknown Zone.

**I will have to find some place close to the Movie Theater that
Has more room for more members to Meet.

Get off I 91 Exit 9
I 91 North, Turn Left, then Turn Right and head towards the Shopping Plaza
I 91 South, head towards the Shopping Plaza
Barnes & Noble and the Movie Theater shall be towards the left hand side
Shopping Plazas.

The Movie will be National Treasure: Book of Secrets.

We should have time to have coffee and meet up briefly before going
To the Movie at 1:20.

Showcase Cinemas
555 Universal Drive
North Haven, CT. 06473
(203) 234-8000


http://www.nationalam...

www.nationalamusements.com/showtimes/default.asp

What is the Movie National Treasure about?

We need to first understand the original movie.

Below are some links to give more details;


http://www.imdb.com/t...

www.imdb.com/title/tt0368891/

http://disney.go.com/...

disney.go.com/disneyvideos/liveaction/nationaltreasure/


Nicholas Cage plays Ben Gates, Historian and Treasure Seeker.
He follows all kinds of weird clues all over the world looking for
A Treasure that his grand father told him about since he was a young boy.

Justin Bartha plays Riley Poole. Riley is the typical comic relief friend who is the one
To say No. We should not be dong this. It will not work - just before Ben Gates goes and
Does it.

Diane Kruger plays Professor Abigail Chase.
Professor Chase is a historian assigned to historic
Artifacts such as the Declaration of Independence (DoI).
She is first kidnapped during the DoI heist. Later, like
Riley, she is in for the treasure hunt.

Following the clues, the adventurers do find the Treasure of the
Free Masons.

From the various movie trailers that I have seen over the last six months,
This time Ben Gates is searching for the book of all secrets to clear
His grand father. The clues will include the President of the
USA and going to England.
You can read various magazines or newspapers for reviews of the movie.

The movie came out on December 21.

http://worldsbiggestt...

worldsbiggesttreasurehunt.movies.go.com/

http://www.imdb.com/t...

www.imdb.com/title/tt0368891/

http://disney.go.com/...

disney.go.com/disneypictures/nationaltreasure/

This will be a joint Greater New Haven Unknown
Zone and Coffee Talk Meet Up.

If other members of CT PRI want to attend, then they are also
Welcome to come. Still keep the number to be total of 10
To allow for seating at Barnes and Nobel Cafe.

Sunday at the Movies Meet Up group out of Norwalk went
To this movie on Sunday, December 30.


Organizer
Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: Members can see the photo of us in this site. We will be in the Coffee Cafe section of this Book Store.
item.why: The reason to sign up and to show up is for Good Coffee, Good Conversation, Good Company and a Good Movie.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Coffee and Movie Treasures
